title: Stopper, ca. 1920–30
provenance: Cecil Davis, Ltd., London (Grosvenor House Antiques Dealers Fair) 1970, Phelps Warren, NY.
description: 3-part mold blown, barrel-shaped body, central band of vertical flutes, diamond pattern above and below, flutes from shoulder to neck, everted lip with pouring spout, molded fluted bullseye stopper.

tombstone.epitaph:
Stopper, ca. 1920–30.
ca. 1920–30. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-220-a,b.
